Identification.LongTitle: Regulations Establishing the Periods Within Which Eligible Authors, Eligible Performers and Eligible Makers not Represented by Collective Societies Can Claim Private Copying Remuneration

Provision.Text: The Copyright Board, pursuant to paragraph 83(13)(b)a of the Copyright Actb, makes the annexed Regulations Establishing the Periods Within Which Eligible Authors, Eligible Performers and Eligible Makers not Represented by Collective Societies Can Claim Private Copying Remuneration.

Section.Text: In these Regulations, Act means the Copyright Act.
The period within which an eligible author must exercise the entitlement referred to in subsection 83(11) of the Act is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 1999-2000, from December 31, 2000 to December 31, 2013;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2001-2002, from December 31, 2002 to December 31, 2013;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2003-2004, from December 31, 2004 to December 31, 2013; and

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of any other tariff certified by the Board under paragraph 83(8)(c) of the Act, from the day on which the tariff ceases to be effective to December 31 of the seventh year after the year in which the tariff ceases to be effective.

Section.Text: The period within which an eligible performer must exercise the entitlement referred to in subsection 83(11) of the Act is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 1999-2000, from December 31, 2000 to December 31, 2016;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2001-2002, from December 31, 2002 to December 31, 2016;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2003-2004, from December 31, 2004 to December 31, 2016;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2005-2007, from December 31, 2007 to December 31, 2016;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2008-2009, from December 31, 2009 to December 31, 2016; and

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of any other tariff certified by the Board under paragraph 83(8)(c) of the Act, from the day on which the tariff ceases to be effective to December 31 of the seventh year after the year in which the tariff ceases to be effective.

Section.Text: The period within which an eligible maker must exercise the entitlement referred to in subsection 83(11) of the Act is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 1999-2000, from December 31, 2000 to December 31, 2013;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2001-2002, from December 31, 2002 to December 31, 2013;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2003-2004, from December 31, 2004 to December 31, 2013;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of the Private Copying Tariff, 2005-2007, from December 31, 2007 to December 31, 2013; and

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of any other tariff certified by the Board under paragraph 83(8)(c) of the Act, from the day on which the tariff ceases to be effective to December 31 of the fifth year after the year in which the tariff ceases to be effective.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on the day on which they are registered.
